WorkItem.Description:
From thread:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/Thread/View.aspx?ThreadId=45529
 
Currently Excel 2007 reader is able to read some built-in number formats. But not all of the ones involving dates.
 
Is there anything we can do to also improve reading capabilities of PHPExcel_Reader_Excel2007 with respect to built-in date number formats?
 
For reference, attached is an example of a workbook where date formatting does not pass through a plain read/write
 
Related work item:
http://www.codeplex.com/PHPExcel/WorkItem/View.aspx?WorkItemId=7313
WorkItem.Summary: Improve support for built-in number formats in PHPExcel_Reader_Excel2007

Comments.Message: Thanks, Maarten, it got better after this fix. But do you have any idea why it is not working with plain read/write of attachment (read.xlsx). Number format does still not survive. Why?
Fixed that one, though locale of the server may differ read/write results.
